## 

### Where do my interest lie?

I am an ardent admirer of the complex modal architecture of Raags and their nuanced affective properties, from the therapeutic cadences of Yaman to the devotional dichotomy of the Bhairavs. A reverence starkly belied by my own vocal deficiencies.

A similar analytical proclivity drives my deconstruction of theological frameworks, approached without dogmatic adherence. My own convictions are empirical and mutable, yet this objective lens consistently reveals a unifying tenet across scriptures: magnanimous inclusivity. :smile:
